thread.section_title: Munyonyo Commonwealth Resort - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Kampala, Uganda) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Chairman
thread.title_full: Chairman - Review of Munyonyo Commonwealth Resort, Kampala, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: Reginald W
title: Chairman
text:
As a business traveler, I travel quite often to many countries all over the world.
The Munyonyo Commonwealth Resort in Kampala , Uganda is without question one of my most favorite destinations!
When I find that my business is taking me to Kampala, Uganda I immediately get a bit excited at the idea of returning there to an absolute international resort environment filled with all the amenities one would expect at a much more expensive facility.
The location is very accessible from both the intercity and the airport.
The grounds are just beautiful! The property will make you question of prior decision to stay at other properties.
The treatment of the staff is second to none! I often tell them they are making very difficult for me to leave!
I strongly suggest this Resort regardless of the occasion. You will not be disappointed!
Munyonyo Commonwealth Resort, Kampala, Uganda-East Africa.
My home away from whenever I'm in East Africa!
Safe travel,
Reggie Word
